alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 20 at 8:29PM MST until August 20 at 8:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM MST FOR MARICOPA COUNTY... At 828 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Wittmann, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Peoria, Surprise, Wittmann, Sun City West, Circle City, Sun City, Surprise Stadium, White Tank Mountain Park, Morristown, Beardsley and Vistancia. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 110 and 144. AZ Route 74 between mile markers 1 and 21. AZ Route 303 between mile markers 112 and 132. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
